title: Leaves of Grass

cover.alt: Green book cover, with golden foreground featuring long, leafy grass ripe with seed. Text at top of cover says 'Leaves of Grass by Walt Whitman'; text at bottom of cover says 'Illustrated by Margaret Cook'.

overview: Walt Whitman first published this collection, one of the most famous in American poetry, in 1855, and kept revising it over several decades until his death.

incidents.description: Publication of the 1881 edition of this book in Boston was cut short after {ln:https://whitmanarchive.org/criticism/current/encyclopedia/entry_26.html|a District Attorney threatened criminal prosecution for the use of 'obscene' language in some of its poems}.  Publication was later resumed in Philadelphia.
